Html:
I would like to group the Bibliography by type, something like this:

 

Articles

 * Author, Year, Paper, Issue

Books

 * Author, Year, Publisher

Internetresources

 * Author, Year, url

 

is that possible?

Not by default in the current version. However, with a little effort, it can be done.

See http://bibword.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=74667 (second post) on how to group sources by type.
